meaningMnemonic: You're walking in a <radical>greenhouse</radical> when you see a <radical>small</radical> <radical>drop</radical> of water fall and it makes you <kanji>yearn for</kanji> the person you <kanji>adore</kanji>. You haven't seen them in so long. But something about being in this greenhouse and seeing that tiny water droplet made your heart burst with longing.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>yearn for</kanji> that person from your past, you look back at the drop and see... <reading>Bo</reading>bo (ぼ) the clown?! Uhg. Apparently Bobo dropped that small drop of water.
